events.message: doc: Add switch on enum example

events.body: ACK c8961c7d9fed07190628cf01f9dfad971a942b99, no excuse now, thanks!
Seems like good advice to me. ACK c8961c7d9fed07190628cf01f9dfad971a942b99

comments.body: The warning is not wrong, though. While it is not undefined behavior to cast any `int` to an `enum class` type and pass it around (where it eventually will hit the `assert`), it seems the right thing to do for sanity.
